website_summaries.verdict: A gentle, powder-based intestinal cleanse supplement that can be mixed in with a glass of water or another drink.
pros: Powder formula that can be mixed in with drinks
Contains all natural ingredients that can help to promote a healthy intestinal tract
cons: May cause constipation if not used correctly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I started of with formula 1 for 5 days and then did a 3 days of formula 2. The products combined worked well and I lost 10 lbs of waste. I now have more movements due to all the old stuff out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for me. I have been taking the formula 1 for about a month and I think my body got used to it. I took four pills and five pills and drank this five times a day with a gallon of water and no type of running to the bathroom. People wrote that they were amazed by the junk that came out their colon. Lol that’s misleading when you drink dark greenish/blackish powder of course your waste will look like that. Formula 1 worked like a charm at first and now it’s not as effective 😞
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Good for thorough cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Can be kinda tough to get down, but it is effective. Do NOT use Formula #2 unless you've been using Formula #1 for at least a few days or this will create constipation big time. I try to use once a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Alone Formula #1 does and excellent job, however
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to be cleaned out. If you're a wuss about nature taking its course then this produce will only make you or break you. Alone Formula #1 does and excellent job, however, when you combine with Formula #2 prepare for intestinal nirvana. I followed the instructions and stayed on a vegetarian diet. Your body will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Misha

customer_reviews.title: This works for sure. Downside is the taste. ...
customer_reviews.text: This works for sure. Downside is the taste... pay the extra money for the pills. You'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: lanabanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stuff works wonders! Used in combination with Oxy Powder. Did that for about a week and then did 3days of this. The stuff that came out of me is disgusting. Will do this once a year.
customer_reviews.author: MissMiami

customer_reviews.title: You won't be dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Really works well for cleaning the bowels out, at least for the time I got to use it, before my cat knocked it off the shelf and into the bathtub before it shattered. Being an herbalist myself, I would also use it mixed with water for a face mask, and it worked better than any facemask I've ever bought or made! Sucks bad stuff out of the pores. Makes skin sooooo soft.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Best GI formula
customer_reviews.text: We have used this formula while living abroad and it has saved us countless times from having to get on antibiotics. I LOVE This stuff. I rated the flavor and ease of swallowing at a 3 star because this stuff isn't "flavorful" If you don't drink it quickly its starts to coagulate and the texture can be hard for some to take down. This is a medicine, its not a sports drink. We have given it to our children as well, it helps to mix it in a juice or soda if you think you won't be able to handle the taste along with the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Shimbobag

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work At All
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations for this after reading the reviews and watching the video, but this #2 formula had no effect on me at all. I had done a colon cleanse about 30 years ago so I know from experience all the years of accumulated waste that was cleansed out of my system with the flattened abdomen afterwards. I used formula #1 for a week beforehand as directed with no problem and then followed with #2 for five days along with #1. I had no results good--or bad. The charcoal wasn't pleasant, but I wouldn't care if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G

customer_reviews.title: TMI?
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this product. Although when I don’t like is that it’s not very easy to dissolve in water. Maybe someone has some tips on this. Maybe if I use some apple cider vinegar or something? Anyways after about a week of using this product you can definitely tell that it’s working because you feel more energy, and your poop turns charcoal gray in color. And the consistency of your stool might be like rabbit turds.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe Horn

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn gone!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! My heartburn is gone, digestion is much improved! I don't mind the slightly nutty taste. Extremely effective, and great for health. I really find Dr. Schulze's formulas very effective.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: 1 + 2=poo
customer_reviews.text: Haven't started this yet as I have just started formula #1. If the results are anything like that I will be very happy with this item. I need to continue with that one before I start no 2 (accidental pun)! I'm looking forward to seeing the results!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the portion instructions you are fine. I love Dr. Schulze’s products & I’m happy to purchase them on Amazon. It’s so easy to purchase them here. I hope to see more of his products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maham Ziabakhsh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product it really works!! Just my 4th day and I feel the effects of the product. Do as Instructions stated 1 capsule to start then increase by 1 each day. I'm stopping at 3 capsule a day! Need to eat clean and more water for me.....going to try formula 2# next week.
customer_reviews.author: Evette Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Been loosing weight and I love this product! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: aijing hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Use as directed. Don’t take too long to drink it or it will thicken up and be harder to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very happy with it. As I am with any Dr. Shculze's product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: This works just like it is designed to and is easy to use. I find that it doesn't really have much taste and don't mind chugging a couple of big glasses full, five times a day for five days. I feel much better afterwards !
customer_reviews.author: howard starr

customer_reviews.title: BEST Cleanse EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing - cleans your colon by absorbing toxins and pulling old reside off your intestinal wall. Mix with juice. Even if it looks black (from the charcoal) it doesn't taste black.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for detox, just that it was hard to stomach for both my husband and myself. Next time we will try the capsules.
customer_reviews.author: lulycelsa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: To help clean out my gut. I use it in some flavored water to help with the taste.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: All of Doctor Shulze's products are top quality. I have been using them for years.I have to be careful with his lung formula as it has lobelia in it and for some reason I have a reaction to lobelia.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hellberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Deep Cleanse!
customer_reviews.text: Been doing a deep cleanse for years now. Found this Formula really does the trick! It's only 5 days long too! Doesn't mix very well with cold water, so keep stirring. Drink extra water when doing this. Also drink clear water right after swallowing this formula, to make sure the esophagus is clear all the way down to the tummy. The only other product I would recommend is Super Colon Cleanse. It's easier for sure, but It's 10 days, and works really well also.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Too strong for me.
customer_reviews.text: Good but had to discontinue right away. Too strong of an effect for me even in minimum dose.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good Natural Gut Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This product always cleans my whole digestive system out. You have to follow directions listed on the jar though and drink plenty of water with it. It has some very good herbs and other natural gut cleansers such a bentonite clay and psyllium. If you are seeking to detox and/or clean your intestines out I can highly recommend this combination supplement. I usually take some other form of natural laxative while taking this. I drink the Smooth Move Tea periodically to help flush everything on its way. That tea and this intestinal formula are some good natural remedies for gut cleansing. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Skylamor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products! I have been using Dr
customer_reviews.text: Amazing products! I have been using Dr. Schulze for many years. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.C

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Taste is okay. Can be a bit overwhelming to drink all day but do-able.
customer_reviews.author: Miki Baby

customer_reviews.title: There are seeds in it.
customer_reviews.text: The taste is fine, but there are seeds in it that you drink. I am on day four and it looks like I will have plenty left over. I felt like the product did what it was supposed to do. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Roderer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great , easy to take. I'm happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Have no doubts about it buy it you'll be truly amazed and glad did There's a new you on way
customer_reviews.text: Exteremly recommended this stuff is # 1 I went from 46 " to 38" in one day no joke IT'S AMAZEING. Stuff. I felt like I dropped a Reptilian baby LOL LOL
customer_reviews.author: Annomus

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get over the taste. It’s a chalky texture and the taste is horrible mixed with water and juice still no improvement
customer_reviews.author: Eva Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Schulze's products are the best. I've been using his stuff for years.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie D.

customer_reviews.title: It's a no for me
customer_reviews.text: What cleansing? Haven't felt a thing! Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: but works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tough to get down, but works like a charm. Just use a straw!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: Been using Schultz's info and products since the mid ninety's.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy forever

customer_reviews.title: Constipating
customer_reviews.text: Made me even more constipated. The capsules are great, this stuff just sludges you up. Yuck. However, it surprisingly didn't taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Working Formula that doesn't explode-ya'
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Schulze's formula #2 product is very promising. Without providing any graphic detail, it does not cause explosive moments and is gentle to the body.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More effective than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for me: way better bowl movements, and far fewer. No adverse side effects so far (one month).
customer_reviews.author: John Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel great using this stuff! Regular, clean, less hungry and loss a few pounds. Feel energized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my intestines were already in good shape.
customer_reviews.text: I went through the cleanse without much change. I didn't see any big movements or smell anything awe full. A bit of cramping happened. Maybe my intestines were already in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Working Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 4 star rating cause it doesn't taste that great - other than taste, it's a 5 star product, excellent & effective - :)
customer_reviews.author: Nash Selvester

customer_reviews.title: ... but i didn't use with formula #1 It wasn't easy to take
customer_reviews.text: didn't really work for me but i didn't use with formula #1 It wasn't easy to take, but i got it down.....
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, can't wait to try more products! Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great programs that work
customer_reviews.text: All of Dr Schulze's products are the highest quality. Make sure you read his free booklets on cleansing on his website[...] I started Dr Schulze's cleansing routines in 1996? Great programs that work! JR
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: This is ABSOLUTELY the best if you have diverticulitis or have ever had an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ABSOLUTELY the best if you have diverticulitis or have ever had an attack ...I use it faithfully .. If I feel an attack coming on ( and if you've had one or more or ended up in the hospital you'll know what I mean ) I take it 2 or 3 times during the day ... It absolutely pulls all the bacteria from those pockets in your intestines .... Has kept me from emergency room trips and the horrible antibiotics that are prescribed when you have an attack ... Thank you dr Schultz ... (I use many of his other products too but occasionally order from Amazon when he doesn't have free shipping )
customer_reviews.author: Jodi M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: This works. Using it for my husband, with Formula #1 which works also. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C. Heard

customer_reviews.title: I mean... it works. If you ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean... it works. If you can get it down. I found the texture led to me almost horking every time. Gave up halfway thru day 2 as it was making me gag from smell alone.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Triptow

customer_reviews.title: but I don't like the heartburn that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: This works, but I don't like the heartburn that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Way too strong
customer_reviews.text: This made my stomach lining very much inflamed. The doctor had to prescribe PPIs.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Aloha

customer_reviews.title: i have already done a report but will do it ...
customer_reviews.text: i have already done a report but will do it again, the product did not work on me, i followed the directions to the letter, all the product it did, was to get me constipated, for me was a waist of money, i gave them one star because of presentation, but will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd item i bought from dr schultzes, no effect, i was trying to do a 5 day cleanse, disappointed, i had to drink 16 oz's of fluid 5 times a day plus extra fluid afterward, nothing, i am gonna give him one more chance, by buying the formula # 1 that apparently suppose to work with the formula #2, if i get no results, i will never try dr schultzes again. it's all about money, the product is not potent enough.
customer_reviews.author: turnaround mom

customer_reviews.title: Dirt in a jar
customer_reviews.text: "Gross"...that's the best review I can give. It doesn't dissolve, it tastes terrible and makes whatever your drinking look like muddy liquid. It's disturbing... I wish there were negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: This is the best yoga mat we have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best yoga mat we have ever had. Not only non slip but sivbeautiful, we leave it unrolled in our yoga space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love his products...the Doc don't play!
customer_reviews.text: He is interested in your health and nothing less. So it cost a bit more... but you get a bit more. He had a clinic where he claimed to be curing people of cancer... problem was... he was... so they closed him down because you cannot be doing things medical science can't do....haha.
customer_reviews.author: StarDar

customer_reviews.title: 5 times a day is a lot of juice. Maybe get the pills?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product after we got back from the Bahamas because we are pretty sure that we got a parasite from some raw conch. It helped my husband but wasn't as effective as I was hoping for myself. However, that might be because we only did it 3 times a day for 5 days rather than 5 times a day. 5 just seemed like too much. I think if I did it again I would order the pills from their website so that I wouldn't have to drink so much juice... I never want to drink juice again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Romero

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!! YOU WILL BE CONSTIPATED BAD
customer_reviews.text: If you like taking large satisfying dumps, do NOT buy this product because you will not take any large satisfying dumps for a VERY LONG time. Your poop will be compacted hard little rocks for weeks following the use of this product even if you use it perfectly per the instructions. I looked up everything I could find about the best way to use this. I used it in conjunction with formula 1. I stayed hydrated throughout. No sh**
customer_reviews.author: phillip wasden

customer_reviews.title: Schulzey's products don't mess around. All top shelf quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Schulzey's products don't mess around. All top shelf quality potency. Follow the directions and keep a port-a-potty at the ready.
customer_reviews.author: E. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Joint pain gone.
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Schulze's Intestinal formulas #1 & 2 are staples in my herbal arsenal. I was having stomach issues and joint pain. Time to cleanse! And I was right. After a few days of using the formulas as directed, all issues were cleared up. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. Raede

customer_reviews.title: Intestinal Vacuum? - Yes
customer_reviews.text: This is called an intestinal vacuum, and it has been true for me. I actually crave this when I run out. It pulls everything out of the colon, if you would like to clean your colon, I highly recommend this product with a clean diet.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for a general cleanse. I always feel so great doing 1 tablespoon 3 times per day away from food for a week or so to clean things out. Can be used for a lot longer for a deeper cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Check with your doctor before using this stuff
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE STUFF! I was ill for ten days and almost took myself to hospital. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and have lost almost 20 lbs in a month. Must use with the formula #1 first and then add this formula..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: powerful intestinal cleanser. just take it with juice and no one gets hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware of whole flax seeds!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have Diverticulitis or are unsure get checked out first!! This formula has whole flax seeds and if one becomes lodged in your intestine it will be very painful and may become infected.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good product. This system with Formula #1 and Formula ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. This system with Formula #1 and Formula #2 got the job done. I passed a good amount of mucoid plaque without discomfort. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tambling

customer_reviews.title: I kept drinking it because I told myself how good it was for me
customer_reviews.text: The taste was very earthy. I kept drinking it because I told myself how good it was for me :). It made a bit constipated so I had to increase my daily water intake and it made me a lil gassy at first.
customer_reviews.author: monica mateo

customer_reviews.title: Move yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Much easier than other cleanses I have tried. The great thing is that if you so choose you can use it without fasting or overly altering you diet. Although it is more effective if you do. Taste isn't bad so it isn't hard to swallow. Only complaint is in how to portion it out. You need to put alot in. Did what I thought was a heaping tablespoon in each time and had plenty left over when I was done.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I will never go without it again. It will save you from normal tummy issues to awful food poisoning.
customer_reviews.author: brittney l

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea how both products got such glowing ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how both products got such glowing reviews. I’ve taken level 1 for 6 days, and am stopped up more. I have the Level 2 powder I just started today. Made my drink sludgy. At this point even if level 2 works, it’s hard to choke down.
customer_reviews.author: M Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well for Me
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite person so I only did this 3 times a day. I had to stop after 3 days because I was going to travel. It worked great. I, once again, have good color stools after the treatment. I will probably do another 3-5 days when my schedule is clear. Along with the Formula #1, I was going several times a day. I did follow the instructions and used the Formula #1 for several days to be sure I was cleaned out and I did continue the Formula #1 while taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Was very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The hype I was told and read I figured this was a no brainer to buy. The product did nothing the directions were founded yet it was as I did not even use. I will still buy there #1 that this company sells.
customer_reviews.author: michael lackey

product_meta.title: Dr. Schulze’s | Intestinal Formula #2 | Herbal Colon Cleanse Formula | 8 Oz. Jar
feature_bullets: INTESTINAL MOVEMENT FORMULA: This colon cleansing formula is specifically designed to get out the accumulation of impurities that you have been collecting and storing for years.

STOOL SOFTENER: Intestinal Formula #2 is a strong purifier and powerful intestinal vacuum that will draw out the old fecal matter and mucus from the walls of your colon and out of any diverticula. This unique formula contains the three most powerful and effective absorbers and neutralizers known: Bentonite clay, activated willow charcoal and apple pectin.

ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Comprised from bentonite clay, activated willow charcoal, apple pectin, marshmallow root, psyllium seed and flax seed, this herbal supplement is designed to absorb and cleanse your colon from over 3,000 known impurities.

ORGANIC REMEDY: For the best results, take 1 heaping teaspoon 5 times daily. Please note, this product is a natural bulk and fiber formula and may have a laxative effect. Drink plenty of water with each dose and follow the directions on the bottle carefully.

NON-GMO & GLUTEN-FREE: Organic, wild-harvested and made with the highest quality of herbal ingredients to support a healthy lifestyle, our Intestinal Formula #2 powder is 100% gluten-free and non-GMO. It also contains no soy, sugar, dairy, whey or any artificial ingredients.
